entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, introduced as they are being ushered onstage.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: A person who is part of Harry's guard and seems to have a connection with Harry's thoughts.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A member of Harry's guard who speaks in a dark tone.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: A witch who is part of Harry's guard and comments on the cleanliness of Muggles.

relationships.description: Lupin is part of Harry's guard.
Moody is also part of Harry's guard.
Tonks is observing the Muggles in the kitchen.
